data.title: Coronation Day Pop
data.meta_description: In honor of the Coronation of King Charles III, we have a special pop-up challenge. This one is ... bin Rashid Al Mulla III  The Vatican, Pope Francis
data.text:
In honor of the Coronation of King Charles III, we have a special pop-up challenge. This one is actually more of scavenger hunt.

Did you know that there are actually 42 monarchies in the world? Only nine are in Europe, the rest are spread across the globe. Malaysia actually has nine monarchs, from which they choose one to serve as "Supreme Ruler" (King of Malaysia) every five years. The United Arab Emirates has seven monarchs - one for each emirate.

Today's pop-up challenge is to help locate each of the world's current monarchs on WikiTree. When you find one, post their ID number below and I'll update the list with a link to their page. I am almost certain some of these royal families are still lacking a presence on WikiTree, in which case we will need to get their profiles added. Let's see how many we can locate.

Nations is red appear to be lacking WikiTree profiles for their current monarchs.

United Kingdom, King Charles III

Bahrain, King Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa (locked)

Belgium, King Philippe (locked)

Bhutan, Bruk Gyalpo (Dragon King) Jigma Khesar Namgyel Wangchuck

Brunei, Sultan Hassanal Bolkiah

Cambodia, King Norodom Sihamoni (needs profile)

Denmark, Queen Margaethe II (locked)

Eswatini, King Mswati III

Japan, Emperor Naruhito

Jordan King Abdullah II

Kuwait Emir Nawf Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah (locked)

Lesotho, King Letsie III

Liechtenstein, Prince Hans-Adam II (locked)

Luxembourg, Grand Duke Henri (locked)

Malaysia

- Pahang, Sultan Abdullah [Current Yang di-Pertuan Agong (King) of Malaysia]

- Kedah, Sultan Mudzaffar Shah I

- Kelantan, Sultan Muhammad V

- Johor, Sultan Ibrahim Ismail

- Negari Sembilan, Yam Tuan Besar (Grand Ruler) Tenku (Prince) Muhriz

- Perak, Sultan Nazrin Shah

- Perlis, Raja Sirajuddin

- Selangor, Sultan Sharafuddin

- Terengganu, Sultan Mizan Zainal Abidin

Monaco, Prince Albert II (locked)

Morocco, King Mohammed IV

The Netherlands, King Willem-Alexander (locked)

Norway, King Harald V

Oman, Sultan Haitham bin Tariq

Qatar, Emir Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani

Saudi Arabia, King Salman

Spain, King Felipe VI (locked)

Sweden, King Carl XVI Gustaf

Thailand, King Vijiralongkorn

Tonga, King Topou VI (locked)

United Arab Emirates

- Abu Dhabi, Shiekh Mohammad bin Zayed Al Nahyan (President of the UAE)

- Ajman, Humaid bin Rashid Al Nuaimi III

- Dubai, Shiekh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum

- Fujairah, Shiekh Hamad bin Mohammad Al Sharqi

- Ras Al Khaimah, Shiekh Saud bin Saqr Al Qasimi

- Sharjah, Shiekh Sultan bin Muhammad Al Qasimi

- Um Al Quwain, Shiekh Abdulla bin Rashid Al Mulla III
